explains: 变黄或发黄（yellow 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.en: The painting has yellowed but the gallery has resisted pressure to touch it up.
sentences.cn: 那幅画已经发黄了，但该画廊顶住了要对其进行修饰的压力。

sentences.en: The white shirt was yellowed with sweat.
Aziraphale turned a few of the yellowed pages.
sentences.cn: 亚茨拉菲尔翻了翻泛黄的书页。
